The game is very addictive and competitive as you can see from my hours. However, this game is VERY beginner unfriendly and I recommend watching videos about the game after Rank 10.
The game is old, and people judge it too harshly. The developers try to make one of the best game (in my opinion) with a system from 2013, so give them a break.
